name: Lone Drone in the Danger Zone
name_original: Lone Drone in the Danger Zone
description:
PRESS '1' TO MOVE IN ONE DIRECTION
RELEASE '1' TO SLOW DOWN
COLLECT PARTS FOR POINTS AND TO RESET DIRECTION
AVOID THE ASTEROIDS
'R' TO RESTART AND 'ESC' TO EXIT AT ANY TIME

THANKS FOR CHECKING MY GAME OUT!

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com
